message.original: 大食堂復旧への第四歩 ―酒樽―
message.translation: Fourth Step to Restoring the Great Dining Hall: Wine Barrel

message.original: 大食堂を復活させるため、酒樽の修復に 必要な素材を探す
修復に必要な特別な素材を探す
message.translation: Search for the special materials needed for repair

message.original: 見つけた素材を大食堂の<NPC 580>に渡す
message.translation: Deliver the located materials to <NPC 580> in the Great Dining Hall
